Back to top

API Documentation#

Preprocessing#

select_genepair_grn(read_filename, ...)

Select gene-pair interactions from base-GRN.

integration_grn(read_filename_atac, ...)

Integration for grn from different sources.

RNAseq_analysis(read_filename1, ...)

scRNA-seq raw data preprocess.

selection_GRNandRNAseq(grn_filename, ...)

Integration with scRNA-seq data and scATAC-seq data.

comparison(selected_grn, rna_seq_genename)

Screen for gene pair names in both scRNA-seq data and scATAC-seq data.

Tools#

global_burst_link(grn_filename, ...)

Inferface for inferring global dynamic information including gene regulatory interaction and bursting kinetics from scRNA-seq data of two genes.

global_uni_burst_link(grn_filename, ...)

Inferface for inferring uni dynamic information including gene regulatory interaction and bursting kinetics from scRNA-seq data of two genes.

genepair_inference(vals, geneinfo, figflag, ...)

Infer dynamic information including gene regulatory interaction and bursting kinetics from scRNA-seq data of two genes.

genepair_burstinference(data)

Infer bursting kinetics for each gene.

genepair_interactionsinference(data, ...)

Infer gene regulatory interactions and regulation visualization.

ks_2samp(x_val, y_val, alpha[, asymptotic])

Performs a multivariate two-sample extension of the Kolmogorov-Smirnov test.

tf_tg_analysis(burst_info_file, degree_file)

Downstream analysis for gene roles in network.

interaction_burst_regression(...)

Bayesian regression for gene regulatory loops and transcrptional bursting.

burst_interaction_overall(burst_info_file)

Downstream analysis for gene overall regulation and transcrptional bursting.

affinity_burst(burst_info)

Downstream analysis for TF binding affinity and transcrptional bursting.

burst_interactionlevel_positive(...)

Downstream analysis for TF binding numbers and transcrptional bursting.

go_enrichment_analysis(gene_list[, ...])

GO enrichment analysis.

Plotting#

network_visualization(counts_file, ...)

Visualization for gene regulatory interactions network embedded with bursting.

TFs_interactiontype_network(readfile_name)

Visualization for gene regulatory interactions type stacked row chart.

scatterplot_burst(readfile_name, thresholds, ...)

Visualization for transcriptional bursting scatter plot.
